metadata.synopsis: The teacher puts the hurt boy in a deadly fight against another student. You can interfere and save the boy, kill him, or watch the events unfold.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the teacher in the training room.

1.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
1.text: K'chakhi! We are training to fight ghaik. You think they will hesitate?
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher beats a cowering student hard in the stomach with a blunt object. Other students watch this, unflinching. The teacher does not acknowledge the player.NodeContext: Angry, has been beating him, posturing for the class

58.speaker: Youth Varrl
58.text: They won't need to, if we keep killing each other for them! It's - it's stupid! Orph-
58.context: NodeContext: Dizzy, scared but defiant; Boy intends to say "Orpheus says..."

16.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
16.text: Stay out of this, istik. They need to learn what happens when they fail to follow orders.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher stops beating the boy, and whips around towards the player.NodeContext: Dismissive of player's interruption, with a malicious smile

59.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
59.text: Why didn't you make the kill? My instructions were clear!

42.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
42.text: K'chakhi! Why do you keep hesitating? My instructions were clear!
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher beats a cowering student hard in the stomach with a blunt object. Other students watch this, unflinching. The teacher does not acknowledge the player.NodeContext: Angry, has been beating him, posturing for the class

44.speaker: Youth Varrl
44.text: Because - because they don't make sense! Killing each other like this, it's stupid! Orph-
44.context: NodeContext: dizzy, scared but defiant; Boy intends to say "Orpheus says..."

21.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
21.text: Silence! It seems your childish prattling is attracting an audience.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher finally acknowledges the playerNodeContext: Teacher finally acnowledges the player

82.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
82.text: You fight again. This time, daggers only. And to the death as instructed.

38.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
38.text: Who wants to challenge this snivelling is'tark?

27.speaker: Player
27.text: I'd bring him to the edge of death. Leave him asking why he deserves to live.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: Offer to fight the boy yourself.

48.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
48.text: Yes, let's see how Varrl fares against the skills of a lesser crèche.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Lesser? A Crèche K'liir hatchling would not have dared defy an elder.

70.speaker: Lae'zel
70.text: Lesser? A Crèche K'liir hatchling would not have dared defy an elder.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: One bad egg does not reflect the true power of Crèche Y'llek.

23.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
23.text: One bad egg does not reflect the true power of Crèche Y'llek.

85.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
85.text: You? Tsk'va. My students do not waste their time fighting such weaklings.

18.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
18.text: But as we seem so intent on doing things differently today, why not?
18.context: NodeContext: Coming around to the idea after first dismissing it outright

78.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
78.text: Take a dagger, stranger. This exercise requires nothing more than a blade, and a backbone.
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player picks up a dagger (can be from floor, rack - cinematic preference)

50.text: What are you waiting for? Begin!
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player picks up a dagger (can be from floor, rack - cinematic preference)

41.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
41.text: What are you waiting for? Begin!
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: The boy advances, his dagger shaking but ready. Then, he drops it...

0.speaker: Youth Varrl
0.text: I - I refuse. There has to be a better way -

74.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
74.text: G'lyck. Kill him, and put us all out of our misery.
74.context: NodeContext: Teacher at the end of their rope

8.speaker: Player
8.text: End him! Shred him with a daggered dance!
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player stabs Varrl, revelling in his agonised screams as they twist the knife. He falls to the floor, dead.NodeContext: Actor note: after pulling the knife from the student, stand for a bit looking down at the student's corpse before walking back,

64.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player stabs Varrl, revelling in his agonised screams as they twist the knife. He falls to the floor, dead.NodeContext: Actor note: after pulling the knife from the student, stand for a bit looking down at the student's corpse before walking back,

13.speaker: Player
13.text: There's no honour in killing a defenceless boy.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher emotionlessly runs Varrl through with his dagger. Varrl screams and falls dead to the floor.NodeContext: Actor note: The student will turn their torso to look back at the teacher right before the teacher slices their neck.

20.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
20.text: Another who lacks the nerve? It seems Varrl's idiocy is contagious.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher emotionlessly runs Varrl through with his dagger. Varrl screams and falls dead to the floor.NodeContext: Actor note: The student will turn their torso to look back at the teacher right before the teacher slices their neck.

49.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher emotionlessly runs Varrl through with his dagger. Varrl screams and falls dead to the floor.NodeContext: Actor note: The student will turn their torso to look back at the teacher right before the teacher slices their neck.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Seems a little murderous to me. I'll pass.
52.context: NodeContext: With a sigh, disappointed player failed to kill Varrl

51.speaker: Player
51.text: The boy's naivety is pathetic. Kill him.
51.context: NodeContext: With a sigh, disappointed player failed to kill Varrl

35.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
35.text: By the good gods, such cruelty. Is your soul truly this sick?

25.speaker: Player
25.text: By the good gods, such cruelty. Is your soul truly this sick?

67.speaker: Wyll
67.text: By the good gods, such cruelty. Is your soul truly this sick?

30.speaker: Player
30.context: NodeContext: With a sigh, disappointed player failed to kill Varrl

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Try to stop yourself. Attack without killing him.
24.context: NodeContext: With a sigh, disappointed player failed to kill Varrl

79.text: *You skilfully avoid hitting any major organs, but apparently it was enough. He's out cold.*
79.context: NodeContext: With a sigh, disappointed player failed to kill Varrl

33.speaker: Narrator
33.text: *You skilfully avoid hitting any major organs, but apparently it was enough. He's out cold.*
33.context: NodeContext: With a sigh, disappointed player failed to kill Varrl

84.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
84.text: Yet another staggering display of incompetence.
84.context: NodeContext: With a sigh, disappointed player failed to kill Varrl

3.speaker: Player
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player stabs Varrl with the dagger. He screams and falls to the floor.NodeContext: Actor note: after pulling the knife from the student, stand for a bit looking down at the student's corpse before walking back,

77.speaker: Narrator
77.text: *The boy appears considerably less... alive than you were anticipating.*
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player stabs Varrl with the dagger. He screams and falls to the floor.NodeContext: Actor note: after pulling the knife from the student, stand for a bit looking down at the student's corpse before walking back,

68.text: *The boy appears considerably less... alive than you were anticipating.*
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player stabs Varrl with the dagger. He screams and falls to the floor.NodeContext: Actor note: after pulling the knife from the student, stand for a bit looking down at the student's corpse before walking back,

66.text: *The boy appears considerably less... alive than you were anticipating.*
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player stabs Varrl with the dagger. He screams and falls to the floor.NodeContext: Actor note: after pulling the knife from the student, stand for a bit looking down at the student's corpse before walking back,

14.speaker: Narrator
14.text: *The boy appears considerably less... alive than you were anticipating.*
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player scratches their head/looks embarassed.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Well look at you, killer. I didn't know you had it in you.
34.context: NodeContext: Coyly, amused. Just watched the player accidentally kill a young gith in combat.

37.speaker: Astarion
37.text: Well look at you, killer. I didn't know you had it in you.
37.context: NodeContext: Coyly, amused. Just watched the player accidentally kill a young gith in combat.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: A true warrior's kill: quick, bloody, and a scream to curdle the stomach juices of Vlaakith herself.

63.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
63.text: A true warrior's kill: quick, bloody, and a scream to curdle the stomach juices of Vlaakith herself.

26.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
26.text: Move him out of the way. We've wasted enough time already.

19.speaker: Player
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Student 2 steps forward, drawing her dagger.

71.speaker: Youth Astyl
71.text: I've been practicing every night, Sa'varsh. Let me have a go.
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Student 2 steps forward, drawing her dagger.

29.speaker: Youth Varrl
29.text: I - I refuse. There has to be a better way -

22.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
22.text: You dropped your guard on your weak side and were completely open to an off-hand counter.
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: The student stabs Varrl with a dagger, killing him.NodeContext: Impossible to please

54.speaker: Player
54.text: If he won't fight, he's useless. Kill him yourself and be done with this.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher hits Varrl a final time, harder than any of the previous, knocking him to the ground.

7.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
7.text: Yes, a demonstration may be just what's needed.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: Killing your own soldiers is an odd strategy for winning a war.
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher hits Varrl a final time, harder than any of the previous, knocking him to the ground.

72.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
72.text: Cowards are not tolerated in our ranks. Though I gather they are welcome in yours.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: No. This is too far. He's learnt his lesson!
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher hits Varrl a final time, harder than any of the previous, knocking him to the ground.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: Leave the boy alone. You made your point.
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher hits Varrl a final time, harder than any of the previous, knocking him to the ground.

56.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
56.text: I suppose your inane spewings have distracted enough from my lesson.
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher hits Varrl a final time, harder than any of the previous, knocking him to the ground.

9.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
9.text: I suppose your inane spewings have distracted enough from my lesson.
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher hits Varrl a final time, harder than any of the previous, knocking him to the ground.

46.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
46.text: Go whet the swords. I want them sharp enough to peel a ghaik's eyeball just by looking at them.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: The teacher hits Varrl a final time, harder than any of the previous, knocking him to the ground.

73.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
73.text: I hope you prove as weak as this should we meet on the battlefield, istik.

28.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
28.text: I hope you do not prove this weak should we share a battlefield, ra'stil.

5.text: And yet here you are, pathetically pleading for the same useless mercy.

60.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
60.text: And yet here you are, pathetically pleading for the same useless mercy.

55.speaker: Sa'varsh Kethk
55.text: This is how we deal with a weakened enemy -
